Class PreferencesController

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.controller.preferences.PreferencesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreferencesController
public class PreferencesController extends Object implements IPreferencesController
The PreferencesController class manages user preferences within the application. It provides functionalities for displaying the preferences UI, handling preference changes, and updating the underlying preferences model. This controller also integrates logging and error reporting functionalities.

  • Constructor Details

    • PreferencesController

      protected PreferencesController()
      Protected constructor to enforce the singleton pattern. Initializes the preferences model, logger model, event subscriptions, and loads the preferences popup view.

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      protected URL getResource(String path)

    • getInstance

      public static PreferencesController getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the PreferencesController.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the PreferencesController.

    • showPreferencesPopup

      public void showPreferencesPopup()
      Displays the preferences popup dialog to the user. This method is responsible for building and showing the preferences interface where users can modify application settings.
      Specified by:
      showPreferencesPopup in interface IPreferencesController

    • preferenceChange

      protected void preferenceChange(PreferenceEvent.PreferenceChanged parentEvent)
      Handles a preference change event. Updates the preferences model with the new value and logs the event. If an error occurs, it is reported to the error controller.
      Parameters:
      parentEvent - the PreferenceChanged event containing the key and new value of the preference.
